post.body: Thanks for the info. Maybe I can blackmail him with it at a later date...
Doesn't a Kindle just read PDFs?
Concerning my current storyline, it probably won't be anything revolutionary. Just a refreshing change of pace.
Either it was a very smart move, or my previous design was a very ill-advised decision ;)
Nothing to do with a deer?! Clearly you don't know the secret ingredient!
Any art online? So do you own th3rd world or just manage it? It's never been clear to me what your guys business model is.
By the way, I like to pretend my comic is younger than 1-year, since I had the site redesign and format change in September ;)
as you try to grow a webcomic, because these experiences would be useful to others in the future.
Yeah, we're all going through the 1 year growing pains. I wish I would have kept a journal of all the stages you go through...
Thanks! We try! :p
Can't wait for the Podcast All-stars!
Yeah, I totally agree. Do you do your own comic, or do you just run th3rd world?
Yeah, what's the warranty on those?
Yeah, I think something with a unique artwork style helps in this regard.
Yeah, I didn't think anything out either--thus my big format change in September.
I was submitting an article under the name "Tony Piro" It was flagged as spam, but maybe they still get through to you...?
Yeah, I had a pretty sweet idea for a new strip yesterday, but its hard to start from scratch (and probably not merited..yet
...if it hits gold, go with it. If you don't "break out," then go back to the drawing board and try something again
In the past you've recommended som Hunt alternatives for pen nibs. Can you remind me what those were?
@oyComics Yeah, I really think some big things will be happening in 2009.
I like your work. I just wish sherpa posted them bigger, so I could enjoy them more.
Yeah, I've been getting some of those. Do they think I'm automatically going to follow them?
...to help
Not sure what you mean. I have an ad review and tutorial http://tinyurl.com/6c34xu If you have specific questions I'd be happy...
Wow. 2009 may really go down as the year when editorial cartooning dies.
Can I commission a Calamities guest strip? ;)
Straub switched 3x a week for this reason.
I think Straub mentioned this when working on Fchords. How often you update should affect the pacing of storytelling....
once a week, it can affect the story pacing
Yes and no. Sometime it's good to give your readers more of a payoff. Also, for your pacing, when the comic is only...
I was referring more to the pacing, which keeps leaving me wanting more info
No, I wasn't criticizing the actual writing. I'm eagerly awaiting what will happen next...
How would we see your twitter post if we weren't following you on twitter? Duh!
It would probably help if Some Day Hero could update more often.
Yeah, that search term probably wouldn't help. I think it's originally for drafting.
Ames Lettering Guides are like $2 online.
Sign up at isitfunny.com The bar is not on my site, it's through this site
When you click the link, there is a tool bar at the top of your web browser which asks "is it funny?"
Thanks. That's better than the alternative (what I usually get)
Woa, Ant Guy isn't red or black!
The strat is fairly recent. 2006 I think. The American Std
@kms007 Sweet. I have the same guitar. It's a classic.
My best wishes go out to you and your family.
Ant Guy in color? Cool!
It was from this book http://tinyurl.com/5zfp6z=si3_rdr_bb_product
That's nice. I just had someone tell me I'm whoring out my readers for having ads on my site.
How'd that happen? I keep telling my readers to keep their distance! ;)
Thanks. This is similar to what I'm already using.
Thanks! It's just so hard to know where to start with out experimenting with them all.
I'm using the 103 Mapping nib
Hey, I don't judge! ;)
Ha! It's actually in the Pennsylvania Dutch area. Predominantly Amish.
Yeah, that would *significantly* affect my webcomic's budget.
Not sure. Check out this forum thread http://tinyurl.com/5nmzh2
...Domain has a high volume of graphics and images such as anime or comic strips" So make of that what you will.
Yeah, I agree. Biff got this message from ADSDAQ "Domains are declined in the Exchange for the following reasons...
Clan of Cats is the latest I've heard being dropped from ADSDAQ.
That's what I'm hoping will save me. It's too early to see if there's a pattern to this. But QC is a big gun to turn down!
Sorry, I've tweeted so much, I'm not sure what you're referring to.
Cool! I didn't even think to check whether you're on twitter.
The reason given by ADSDAQ is usually something like "we can't contextualize graphic heavy sites," but I think that's BS
Also see http://www.battlecreekenquirer.com/article/20081205/BUSINESS/812050312/1002/NEWS01
I've heard of QC, Book of Biff, Elf Life, and Multiplex all being dropped by ADSDAQ.
Hope you get better soon!
Or at least Oakland smelled as good as Oakland can possibly smell... ;)
Thanks for reminding me. I've been meaning to look into that.
Yeah, this is pretty bad. If ADSDAQ doesn't want on QC, we're all in trouble.
Book of Biff has value click, but not sure how well it does. You might be interested in this thread http://tinyurl.com/624or8
No kidding. My webcomic could definitely use some financial assistance to get back into the black!
Anything you guys can do about ADSDAQ would mean a lot to the webcomic community. Thanks!
Really, brushes? I didn't expect that from your artwork for some reason.
I would say no since microns have a dead line.
I'm trying out a brush for inking instead of my normal dip pen
Congrats! Don't forget about us little people when you're big and famous.
no kidding. right now I'm holding the brush way too tight
next you're going to tell me you're both a fender and gibson guy! ;)
That has surely ben used in a lot of songs.
I saw Meridith Gran do it, and I think I might be over my head now :(
All goof points. It's ADSDAQ's prerogative where they put ads. I was just hopeful that some happy medium could be reached.
Thank! I appreciate it.
...are not meeting the needs of advertisers?
In addition, since ADSDAQ chooses dynamically whether to fill ads or not, can't they adjust their algorithm for sites that...
But shouldn't this be decided on a case by case basis rather than banning all webcomics?
That sounds pretty awesome. Much better than some of the crazy stuff that's been posted in the blog thread.
Why did you stop at 3 bacons?
Sounds great, right? How do you avoid just eating the lip balm? Or do you prefer the bacon ice cream?
cool blog! I'll have to share this with my readers.
Cool! Glad it was helpful.
I'm actually still on...don't tell anyone... ;)
Looks good. I like the use of tones. It's a great style for the comic.
Also, you might have to restart photoshop.
Do you have your line work artwork opened, and is it in a full color format?
Ha ha. Hey, you helped me a lot with that. Just wanted to spread the word!
Cool site design. I like what you did with the header.
radiohead. yes.
Awesome. The smithsonian is breathtaking. One of my favorite spaces to visit.
Awesome! Almost to 100!
Congrats! Any sort of recognition you receive is much deserved!
Oh no! Now I'm infecting other minds as well!
Okay, just between you and me, will A&S be worth listening to if you're not there?... ;)
Wow, thanks! I appreciate that.
no. that's cold man!
...and I won't let it go without notice.
I'll feature each of the losing strips in the blog individually throughout Jan and Feb. I appreciate the work that was done...
Yeah, that is pretty nice company now that you mention it. Thanks!
Thanks!
They're like the Oscars...except no one cares. ;)
If the syndicate says you're too much like Doonesbury, does that mean nobody else is allowed to do political strips? What the heck
Definitely Transformers
Cool, thanks! Now, if I would have been smart, I would actually have *my own* stuff on the front page to take advantage! ;)
I won't complain.
There's no 1st, 2nd and 3rd. There all winners. Maybe I should have made that clear.
Hey, Dawn does great stuff! I'm intimidated by it as well!
Stop tweeting, and start playing!
Awesome! 2012, here we come!
Hmmm...whoever invented eggnog was a genius
Part 2 of a possibly epic storyline http://tinyurl.com/5qm7jo
Somewhere I recently saw a chart comparing pen nib flexibility vs line width on a 2-d chart. Where did I see this?!
Book of Biff has been dumped by ADSDAQ. The beginning of the end? http://tinyurl.com/624or8
If you get a chance, please vote for calamities on "is it funny?" http://tinyurl.com/6jwx6o
New comic. A cliff hanger right before the weekend, I know, I'm cruel http://tinyurl.com/5altmx
weird http://tinyurl.com/2dacfj
Listening to Jerzy's favorite podcast: This Week in Media http://tinyurl.com/2dacfj
New blog post: Read One Swoop Fell today http://tinyurl.com/5wz79g
If anyone is interested, I found that pen nib chart...it's just not readable http://calamitiesofnature.com/images/nibs.png
Did you know there's a group of cities in Pennsylvania with the names Intercourse, Blue Balls, and Virginville? Time to write a comic!
you know I'm desperate for new music at work when I listen to youtube with the window minimized
New comic posted. Double sized! http://tinyurl.com/6dmpqr
More webcomics dropped from ADSDAQ, including SMBC, Sheldon, and Bellen! Waiting for my turn.
Night everyone!
Finished inking strip. It will be interesting to see if anyone notices the change.
informal inking poll (if anyone is awake) brush or quill?
Hmmm...trying inking with a brush....this is tough
Wyclef Jean Apocalypse...best beat ever?
If you have any crazy stories or recipes involving bacon (the best food in the world) I'd love to hear it http://tinyurl.com/58hxd4
Wow, reddit has a bacon section! http://www.reddit.com/r/bacon
Retweet: New comic. Sorry, I couldn't resist a math joke http://tinyurl.com/6kasgf
New comic. Sorry, I couldn't resist a math joke http://tinyurl.com/6kasgf

If you're still awake, I just posted a short flatting tutorial http://tinyurl.com/6pk4kk
Learning to ink with a brush reminds me of playing a guitar before my fingers had been strengthened.
Up to part 7 of my epic storyline http://tinyurl.com/6jfrhb

Today's guest strip winner is in the style of Diesel Sweeties http://tinyurl.com/9z9sck

*Finally* getting a chance to watch Iron Man. Thank goodness for the holidays (and guest strips).
